name: Star Rising
description:
Rise to become the highest and brightest star.
Control a Fallen Star Weaving your way up into the Universe, whilst avoiding other stars, Collect Power Stars to earn points and swap for Helpers.
Three Game modes to challenge your skills.
Puzzling game play, to challenge your brain.
Three random universes.
GameCentre to challenge your'e friends and the Universe.



Music by Eric Matyas
www.soundimage.org
